Package de.fraunhofer.iais.eis

Enum UsagePolicyClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<UsagePolicyClass>
      • de.fraunhofer.iais.eis.UsagePolicyClass
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModelClass, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<UsagePolicyClass>
    public enum UsagePolicyClass
extends java.lang.Enum<UsagePolicyClass>
implements ModelClass
    Defined usage policy classes in the IDS.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant Description
      ALLOW_DATA_USAGE
      This policy restricts the usage of the data to a specific Data Consumer, regardless of how many connectors they have and without any further usage restriction.
      APPLICATION_RESTRICTED_DATA_USAGE
      This policy restricts the usage of the data to a specific system or application inside an IDS Connector.
      ATTACH_POLICY_FOR_THIRD_PARTY
      This policy restricts the usage of data assets with the obligation to notify a specific party about the data usage.
      CONNECTOR_RESTRICTED_DATA_USAGE
      This policy restrict the usage of the data to a specific IDS connector.
      DATA_RENTAL
      This policy restricts transfer of data in return for a monthly fee.
      DISTRIBUTE_ONLY_IF_ENCRYPTED
      This policy restricts the usage of data assets with the obligation to encrypt the data asset before distribution.
      DURATION_RESTRICTED_DATA_USAGE
      This policy restricts the usage of the data to a specific duration.
      EVENT_RESTRICTED_DATA_USAGE
      This policy restricts the usage of data assets limited to specific events.
      INTERVAL_RESTRICTED_DATA_USAGE
      This policy restricts the usage of the data to a specific (time) interval.
      LOCAL_LOGGING
      This policy restricts the usage of data assets with the obligation to log prior specified processes, such as the data access.
      LOCATION_RESTRICTED_DATA_USAGE
      This policy restricts the usage of the data to a specific location, e.g., expressed via location areas, geographic points or geographic bounding polygons.
      MODIFY_DATA_IN_REST
      This policy restricts the usage of data assets with the obligation to anonymize the data before permission to use the data is granted.
      MODIFY_DATA_IN_TRANSIT
      This policy restricts the usage of data assets with the obligation to anonymize the data when it is leaving the Data Provider connector or when it is entering the Data Consumer connector
      PREPATUAL_DATA_SALE
      This policy restricts the transfer of a Data Asset against a one-off payment in a given currency.
      PURPOSE_RESTRICTED_DATA_USAGE
      This policy restricts the usage of data assets limited to specific purposes.
      REMOTE_NOTIFICATION
      This policy restricts the usage of data assets with the obligation to notify a specific party about the data usage.
      RESTRICTED_NUMBER_OF_USAGES
      This policy restricts the usage of data assets limited to numeric count of executions of actions.
      ROLE_RESTRICTED_DATA_USAGE
      This policy restricts the usage of the data to a specific role.
      SECURITY_LEVEL_RESTRICTED_POLICY
      This policy restricts the usage of data assets limited to a security level the consumer must conform to.
      STATE_RESTRICTED_POLICY
      This policy restricts the usage of data assets limited to specific states.
      USE_DATA_AND_DELETE_AFTER
      This policy restricts the usage of data assets with the obligation to delete the asset after usage.

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • ALLOW_DATA_USAGE

        public static final UsagePolicyClass ALLOW_DATA_USAGE
        This policy restricts the usage of the data to a specific Data Consumer, regardless of how many connectors they have and without any further usage restriction.

      • APPLICATION_RESTRICTED_DATA_USAGE

        public static final UsagePolicyClass APPLICATION_RESTRICTED_DATA_USAGE
        This policy restricts the usage of the data to a specific system or application inside an IDS Connector.

      • ATTACH_POLICY_FOR_THIRD_PARTY

        public static final UsagePolicyClass ATTACH_POLICY_FOR_THIRD_PARTY
        This policy restricts the usage of data assets with the obligation to notify a specific party about the data usage.

      • CONNECTOR_RESTRICTED_DATA_USAGE

        public static final UsagePolicyClass CONNECTOR_RESTRICTED_DATA_USAGE
        This policy restrict the usage of the data to a specific IDS connector.

      • DATA_RENTAL

        public static final UsagePolicyClass DATA_RENTAL
        This policy restricts transfer of data in return for a monthly fee. The ending is not specified. Nevertheless, the policy ends when a notice of termination has been made by any of the policy partners.

      • DISTRIBUTE_ONLY_IF_ENCRYPTED

        public static final UsagePolicyClass DISTRIBUTE_ONLY_IF_ENCRYPTED
        This policy restricts the usage of data assets with the obligation to encrypt the data asset before distribution.

      • DURATION_RESTRICTED_DATA_USAGE

        public static final UsagePolicyClass DURATION_RESTRICTED_DATA_USAGE
        This policy restricts the usage of the data to a specific duration.

      • EVENT_RESTRICTED_DATA_USAGE

        public static final UsagePolicyClass EVENT_RESTRICTED_DATA_USAGE
        This policy restricts the usage of data assets limited to specific events. The ODRL language defines an identified event as a context for exercising the action of the Rule. Events are temporal periods of time. A Data Provider may want to restrict the usage of the data to a specific event when the exact time and date of the event is not clear in advance. Therefore, the event condition can be specified in a policy.

      • INTERVAL_RESTRICTED_DATA_USAGE

        public static final UsagePolicyClass INTERVAL_RESTRICTED_DATA_USAGE
        This policy restricts the usage of the data to a specific (time) interval.

      • LOCAL_LOGGING

        public static final UsagePolicyClass LOCAL_LOGGING
        This policy restricts the usage of data assets with the obligation to log prior specified processes, such as the data access.

      • LOCATION_RESTRICTED_DATA_USAGE

        public static final UsagePolicyClass LOCATION_RESTRICTED_DATA_USAGE
        This policy restricts the usage of the data to a specific location, e.g., expressed via location areas, geographic points or geographic bounding polygons.

      • MODIFY_DATA_IN_REST

        public static final UsagePolicyClass MODIFY_DATA_IN_REST
        This policy restricts the usage of data assets with the obligation to anonymize the data before permission to use the data is granted. In contrast to the idsc:MODIFY_DATA_IN_TRANSIT policy class, it demands the modifications to be done when data is stored.

      • MODIFY_DATA_IN_TRANSIT

        public static final UsagePolicyClass MODIFY_DATA_IN_TRANSIT
        This policy restricts the usage of data assets with the obligation to anonymize the data when it is leaving the Data Provider connector or when it is entering the Data Consumer connector

      • PREPATUAL_DATA_SALE

        public static final UsagePolicyClass PREPATUAL_DATA_SALE
        This policy restricts the transfer of a Data Asset against a one-off payment in a given currency.

      • PURPOSE_RESTRICTED_DATA_USAGE

        public static final UsagePolicyClass PURPOSE_RESTRICTED_DATA_USAGE
        This policy restricts the usage of data assets limited to specific purposes.

      • REMOTE_NOTIFICATION

        public static final UsagePolicyClass REMOTE_NOTIFICATION
        This policy restricts the usage of data assets with the obligation to notify a specific party about the data usage.

      • RESTRICTED_NUMBER_OF_USAGES

        public static final UsagePolicyClass RESTRICTED_NUMBER_OF_USAGES
        This policy restricts the usage of data assets limited to numeric count of executions of actions. A mechanism is needed that counts the usage of data in order to enforce the policy.

      • ROLE_RESTRICTED_DATA_USAGE

        public static final UsagePolicyClass ROLE_RESTRICTED_DATA_USAGE
        This policy restricts the usage of the data to a specific role. For example, you can instantiate a policy of this class that allows only the members of the engineering department to use your data. This policy class faces few limitations, i.e., in order to evaluate the conditions, it requires that the user roles are available and follow a common vocabulary

      • SECURITY_LEVEL_RESTRICTED_POLICY

        public static final UsagePolicyClass SECURITY_LEVEL_RESTRICTED_POLICY
        This policy restricts the usage of data assets limited to a security level the consumer must conform to.

      • STATE_RESTRICTED_POLICY

        public static final UsagePolicyClass STATE_RESTRICTED_POLICY
        This policy restricts the usage of data assets limited to specific states. Possible states include, for example, that the contract for the given data asset has not yet expired.

      • USE_DATA_AND_DELETE_AFTER

        public static final UsagePolicyClass USE_DATA_AND_DELETE_AFTER
        This policy restricts the usage of data assets with the obligation to delete the asset after usage.
